sentences.english: Inefficient uterine action should be corrected before attributing dystocia to a pelvic problem.
sentences.chinese: 在骨盆问题引起的难产前，无效的宫缩应该加以纠正。

sentences.english: Red raspberry leaf - highly regarded for its ability to tone the uterus and muscles of the pelvic region.
sentences.chinese: 能够调节子宫肌肉和骨盆区域。

sentences.english: Occiput anterior is usually the easiest position for the fetal head to traverse the maternal pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 枕前通常是胎儿最易经过产妇骨盆的胎位。

sentences.english: Those symptoms include abdominal discomfort, urgency to urinate and pelvic pain.
sentences.chinese: 这些症状包括腹部不适，尿急尿频和骨盆疼痛。

sentences.english: Occiput anterior is usually the easiest position for the fetal head to traverse the maternal pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 枕前通常是胎儿最易通过产妇骨盆的胎位。

sentences.english: Sterile drapes were whisked onto the patient's chest and pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 护士将无菌手术巾铺在病人胸部和骨盆上。

sentences.english: Men need to be motivated and have their pelvic floor neurologically intact.
sentences.chinese: 这些患者需要运动以保持其骨盆神经的完整性。
性，强健骨盆底部肌肉群。

sentences.english: An integrated door substrate and pelvic bolster is provided for use in a vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 集成的门基板和骨盆提供了加强在汽车的使用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the rehabilitation of pelvis disarticulation amputees .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨全骨盆切除后的综合康复方法。

sentences.english: Men can also benefit from strengthening their pelvic floor muscles by doing pelvic floor exercises.
sentences.chinese: 男人也可以受益于加强骨盆做自由体操的盆底肌肉。

sentences.english: Your doctor will do a physical exam including a pelvic exam with pap smear.
sentences.chinese: 你的医生将做一次体检，包括带子宫抹片的骨盆检查。

sentences.english: They translate the lifting power of the serratus muscles into elevation of the midabdomen and frontal pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 它将前锯肌的提升力传导到中腹部和骨盆前侧。

sentences.english: My pelvis would hurt at night when I slept on my stomach.
sentences.chinese: 我夜里睡觉的时候如果俯卧的话，骨盆就会痛。

sentences.english: A woman's anatomy allows one less sacral segment to lock with the pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 女性的生理构造中，骶骨与骨盆的连结比男性少一点。

sentences.english: In pelvic fractures, the most common life-threatening complication is bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 对于骨盆骨折，失血为最常见的危及生命的并发症。
